text: CJMK-FM is a radio station serving Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. Owned by Saskatoon Media Group and broadcasting on 98.3 FM, the station broadcasts a classic hits format branded as "98 Cool FM". ==History== The station received approval in 2000 Decision CRTC 2000-73 and CJMK was launched in 2001 by Hildebrand Communications as "Magic 98.3". On January 17, 2014, the station flipped from hot adult contemporary to classic hits, branded as "98 Cool FM". ==References== ==External links== * 98 COOL FM * * JMK JMK Category:Radio stations established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Saskatchewan
title: CJMK-FM
